trigger.match: *QUEST: You have run out of time for your quest*
trigger.send: statusquest=0 InfoBackground ("#F5F5DC") SetStatus(" ") EnableGroup ("questgroup", false)
if statusdetail > 0 then if statusgroup > 0 then SendNoEcho("gt " .. clr1 .. "Scry Alert:" .. clr2 .. " triggered by [" .. clr3 .. "%2" .. clr2 .. "]") end end

trigger.match: *[ 10 minutes of double exp started courtesy of donations being open ]*
trigger.send: statusdouble=1 mobkilldouble=0 mobexpdouble=0 mobgolddouble=0
attribstrmax=tonumber("%1") attribstrnat=tonumber("%2") attribintmax=tonumber("%3") attribintnat=tonumber("%4") attribwismax=tonumber("%5") attribwisnat=tonumber("%6") attribhr=tonumber("%7")
attribdexmax=tonumber("%1") attribdexnat=tonumber("%2") attribconmax=tonumber("%3") attribconnat=tonumber("%4") attribluckmax=tonumber("%5") attriblucknat=tonumber("%6") attribdr=tonumber("%7")
attribhp1=tonumber("%1") attribhp2=tonumber("%2") attribmana1=tonumber("%3") attribmana2=tonumber("%4") attribmove1=tonumber("%5") attribmove2=tonumber("%6")
attribtrains=tonumber("%1") attribpracs=tonumber("%2") attribsaves=tonumber("%3")

trigger.match: For the next 10 minutes experience is doubled in honor of the new superhero.
trigger.send: statusdouble=1 mobkilldouble=0 mobexpdouble=0 mobgolddouble=0

trigger.match: (Use 'SCORE' and 'WHOIS' to see more details on your character)
trigger.send:
tempstorage=clr1 .. "Str" .. clr3 .. "[" .. clr2 .. attribstrmax .. clr3 .. ":" .. clr1 .. attribstrnat .. clr3 .. "] " tempstorage=tempstorage .. clr1 .. "Int" .. clr3 .. "[" .. clr2 .. attribintmax .. clr3 .. ":" .. clr1 .. attribintnat .. clr3 .. "] " tempstorage=tempstorage .. clr1 .. "Wis" .. clr3 .. "[" .. clr2 .. attribwismax .. clr3 .. ":" .. clr1 .. attribwisnat .. clr3 .. "] " tempstorage=tempstorage .. clr1 .. "Dex" .. clr3 .."[" .. clr2 .. attribdexmax .. clr3 .. ":" .. clr1 .. attribdexnat .. clr3 .. "] " tempstorage=tempstorage .. clr1 .. "Con" .. clr3 .. "[" .. clr2 .. attribconmax .. clr3 .. ":" .. clr1 .. attribconnat .. clr3 .. "] " tempstorage=tempstorage .. clr1 .. "Luck" .. clr3 .. "[" .. clr2 .. attribluckmax .. clr3 .. ":" .. clr1 .. attriblucknat .. clr3 .. "] "
tempstorage=tempstorage .. clr1 .. "HrDr" .. clr3 .. "[" .. clr2 .. attribhr .. clr3 .. ":" .. clr2 .. attribdr .. clr3 .. "] " tempstorage=tempstorage .. clr1 .. "Saves" .. clr3 .. "[" .. clr2 .. attribsaves .. clr3 .. "]" .. clr3 .." "
tempstorage=tempstorage .. clr1 .. "Hp" .. clr3 .. "[" .. clr2 .. attribhp1 .. clr3 .. ":" .. clr1 .. attribhp2 .. clr3 .. "] " tempstorage=tempstorage .. clr1 .. "Mn" .. clr3 .. "[" .. clr2 .. attribmana1 .. clr3 .. ":" .. clr1 .. attribmana2 .. clr3 .. "] " tempstorage=tempstorage .. clr1 .. "Mv" .. clr3 .. "[" .. clr2 .. attribmove1 .. clr3 .. ":" .. clr1 .. attribmove2 .. clr3 .. "] "
tempstorage=tempstorage .. clr3 .. "[" .. clr2 .. attribtrains .. clr1 .. "trains" .. " " tempstorage=tempstorage .. clr2 .. attribpracs .. clr1 .. "pracs" .. clr3 .. "]"
SendNoEcho(sendresults .. " :has" .. clr3 .. " " .. tempstorage)
EnableGroup ("attrib", false)

trigger.match: Double experience for 10 minutes courtesy of*
trigger.send: statusdouble=1 mobkilldouble=0 mobexpdouble=0 mobgolddouble=0

trigger.match: INFO: Bonus experience has now expired.
trigger.send:
if mobkilldouble > 0 then tempstorage=clr1 .. "LastDouble" .. " " tempstorage=tempstorage .. clr2 .. mobkilldouble .. clr3 .. ":" .. clr1 .. "kills "
tempstorage=tempstorage .. clr2 .. mobexpdouble .. clr3 .. ":" .. clr1 .. "exps " tempstorage=tempstorage .. clr3 .. math.ceil(mobexpdouble/mobkilldouble) .. clr1 .. "exp/kill "
tempstorage=tempstorage .. clr2 .. mobgolddouble .. clr3 .. ":" .. clr1 .. "gold " tempstorage=tempstorage .. clr3 .. math.ceil(mobgolddouble/mobkilldouble) .. clr1 .. "gold/kill"
if statusdetail > 0 then if statusgroup > 0 then SendNoEcho("gt " .. tempstorage) else SendNoEcho("echo " .. tempstorage) end end
end statusdouble=0
male=0
male=0

timetemp=math.abs(os.difftime (timestart, os.time ())) timehh=(math.floor(math.abs(timetemp/3600))) timemm=(math.floor(math.abs(timetemp/60))-(timehh*60)) timess=timetemp-(timehh*3600) timess=timess-(timemm*60) timeduration="" if timehh > 0 then timeduration=clr2 .. timehh .. clr1 .. "hrs" end if timemm > 0 then timeduration=timeduration .. clr2 .. timemm .. clr1 .. "mins" end timeduration=timeduration .. clr2 .. timess .. clr1 .. "secs"
skillmas=skillmas + 1
if statusdetail > 0 then SendNoEcho(sendresults .. " " .. clr1 .. "After " .. clr2 .. timeduration .. " my " .. clr3 .. "%2" .. clr1 .. " is complete(".. skillmas .. ").") Execute("#senddisplay") end

EnableGroup ("questgroup", false) EnableGroup ("levellingresults", false) EnableGroup ("puppingresults", false) EnableGroup ("attrib", false)
statusdouble=0 statusdetail=1 statusgroup=1 statusquest=0 pkcheck=0
Execute("#sendhelp")
InfoBackground ("#F5F5DC") InfoClear() InfoFont ("Arial", 10, 3) Info("Sharp Tracker " .. stversion .. " Reconnected: ") Info("IMPORTANT: If you computer rebooted, you MUST type --> #startup")

timetemp=math.abs(os.difftime (timestart, os.time ())) timehh=(math.floor(math.abs(timetemp/3600))) timemm=(math.floor(math.abs(timetemp/60))-(timehh*60)) timess=timetemp-(timehh*3600) timess=timess-(timemm*60) timeduration=""
if timehh > 0 then timeduration=clr2 .. timehh .. clr1 .. "hrs" end if timemm > 0 then timeduration=timeduration .. clr2 .. timemm .. clr1 .. "mins" end timeduration=timeduration .. clr2 .. timess .. clr1 .. "secs"
assassintotal=assassintotal + 1
if statusdetail > 0 then SendNoEcho(sendresults .. " " .. clr1 .. "Assassinate-" .. assassintotal .. "/" .. (mobkilltotal+1) .. ": " .. clr2 .. timeduration .. clr3 .. ": " .. clr2 .. "%2" .. clr1 .. ".") Execute("#senddisplay") end
male=0

timetemp=math.abs(os.difftime (timestart, os.time ())) timehh=(math.floor(math.abs(timetemp/3600))) timemm=(math.floor(math.abs(timetemp/60))-(timehh*60)) timess=timetemp-(timehh*3600) timess=timess-(timemm*60) timeduration=""
if timehh > 0 then timeduration=clr2 .. timehh .. clr1 .. "hrs" end if timemm > 0 then timeduration=timeduration .. clr2 .. timemm .. clr1 .. "mins" end timeduration=timeduration .. clr2 .. timess .. clr1 .. "secs"
deathblowtotal=deathblowtotal + 1
if statusdetail > 0 then SendNoEcho(sendresults .. " " .. clr1 .. "DeathBlow-" .. deathblowtotal .. "/" .. (mobkilltotal+1) .. ": " .. clr2 .. timeduration .. clr3 .. ": " .. clr2 .. "%2" .. clr1 .. ".") Execute("#senddisplay") end
male=0
male=0
male=0
male=0

trigger.match: *Your weapon glows brightly and almost decapitates *.
trigger.send:
timetemp=math.abs(os.difftime (timestart, os.time ())) timehh=(math.floor(math.abs(timetemp/3600))) timemm=(math.floor(math.abs(timetemp/60))-(timehh*60)) timess=timetemp-(timehh*3600) timess=timess-(timemm*60) timeduration=""
if timehh > 0 then timeduration=clr2 .. timehh .. clr1 .. "hrs" end if timemm > 0 then timeduration=timeduration .. clr2 .. timemm .. clr1 .. "mins" end timeduration=timeduration .. clr2 .. timess .. clr1 .. "secs"
vorpaltotal=vorpaltotal + 1
if statusdetail > 0 then SendNoEcho(sendresults .. " " .. clr1 .. "Vorpal-" .. vorpaltotal .. "/" .. (mobkilltotal+1) .. clr3 .. ": " .. clr2 .. timeduration .. clr3 .. ": " .. clr2 .. "%2" .. clr1 .. ".") Execute("#senddisplay") end

trigger.match: *If you want to keep this item, don't forget to 'preserve' it.
trigger.send: skintotal=skintotal + 1 Execute("#senddisplay") SendNoEcho("cast id skin")

trigger.match: You are taxed * gold coin* by your clan.
trigger.send:
testvariable = (string.gsub("%1", ",", ""))
if tonumber(testvariable) then mobgold=tonumber(testvariable) mobgoldtotal=mobgoldtotal - mobgold mobgoldhour=mobgoldhour - mobgold mobgolddouble=mobgolddouble - mobgold clantaxtotal=clantaxtotal + mobgold end
Execute("#senddisplay")

trigger.match: *That corpse is not high enough quality to skin an item for your level.
trigger.send: SendNoEcho("troph")

trigger.match: You haggle * for an extra * gold.
trigger.send:
testvariable = (string.gsub("%2", ",", ""))
if tonumber(testvariable) then mobgold=tonumber(testvariable) mobgoldtotal=mobgoldtotal + mobgold mobgoldhour=mobgoldhour + mobgold mobgolddouble=mobgolddouble + mobgold end
Execute("#senddisplay")
trophytotal=trophytotal + 1 Execute("#senddisplay")

testvariable = (string.gsub("%2", ",", ""))
if tonumber(testvariable) then mobgold=tonumber(testvariable) mobgoldtotal=mobgoldtotal + mobgold mobgoldhour=mobgoldhour + mobgold mobgolddouble=mobgolddouble + mobgold end
Execute("#senddisplay")

testvariable = %1
if tonumber(testvariable) then mobexp=tonumber(testvariable) mobexptotal=mobexptotal + mobexp mobexphour=mobexphour + mobexp mobexpdouble=mobexpdouble + mobexp end

testvariable = %1 if tonumber(testvariable) then mobexp=tonumber(testvariable) mobexptotal=mobexptotal + mobexp mobexphour=mobexphour + mobexp mobexpdouble=mobexpdouble + mobexp end
testvariable = %2 if tonumber(tempstring2) then mobexp=tonumber(testvariable) mobexptotal=mobexptotal + mobexp mobexphour=mobexphour + mobexp mobexpdouble=mobexpdouble + mobexp end

testvariable = %1
if tonumber(testvariable) then mobexp=tonumber(testvariable) mobexptotal=mobexptotal + mobexp mobexphour=mobexphour + mobexp mobexpdouble=mobexpdouble + mobexp end

testvariable = %1 if tonumber(testvariable) then mobexp=tonumber(testvariable) mobexptotal=mobexptotal + mobexp mobexphour=mobexphour + mobexp mobexpdouble=mobexpdouble + mobexp end
testvariable = %2 if tonumber(tempstring2) then mobexp=tonumber(testvariable) mobexptotal=mobexptotal + mobexp mobexphour=mobexphour + mobexp mobexpdouble=mobexpdouble + mobexp end

testvariable = %1
if tonumber(testvariable) then mobexp=tonumber(testvariable) mobexptotal=mobexptotal + mobexp mobexphour=mobexphour + mobexp mobexpdouble=mobexpdouble + mobexp end

trigger.match: *You raise a level! You are now level *.
trigger.send: EnableGroup ("levellingresults", true) tempstorage=clr1 .. "Levelled to %2"

trigger.match: *You gain * hit points, * mana, * moves, * practices and * trains.
trigger.send:
leveltotal=leveltotal+1 levelhps=levelhps + tonumber(%2) levelmana=levelmana + tonumber(%3) levelmoves=levelmoves + tonumber(%4) levelpractices=levelpractices + tonumber(%5) leveltrains=leveltrains + tonumber(%6)
tempstorage=tempstorage .. clr1 .. "(" .. leveltotal .. ") " tempstorage=tempstorage .. clr2 .. tonumber(%2) .. clr3 .. ":" .. clr1 .. "(" .. levelhps .. ")hps " tempstorage=tempstorage .. clr2 .. tonumber(%3) .. clr3 .. ":" .. clr1 .. "(" .. levelmana .. ")mana " tempstorage=tempstorage .. clr2 .. tonumber(%4) .. clr3 .. ":" .. clr1 .. "(" .. levelmoves .. ")moves " tempstorage=tempstorage .. clr2 .. tonumber(%5) .. clr3 .. ":" .. clr1 .. "(" .. levelpractices .. ")pracs " tempstorage=tempstorage .. clr2 .. tonumber(%6) .. clr3 .. ":" .. clr1 .. "(" .. leveltrains .. ")trains"
EnableGroup ("levellingresults", false)
if statusdetail > 0 then if statusgroup > 0 then SendNoEcho("gt " .. tempstorage) else SendNoEcho("echo " .. tempstorage) end end
Execute("#senddisplay")

trigger.match: *You gain an extra * quest points 'MCCP Bonus'.
trigger.send:
timetemp=math.abs(os.difftime (questtime1, os.time ())) timehh=(math.floor(math.abs(timetemp/3600))) timemm=(math.floor(math.abs(timetemp/60))-(timehh*60)) timess=timetemp-(timehh*3600) timess=timess-(timemm*60)
timeduration="" if timehh > 0 then timeduration=clr2 .. timehh .. clr1 .. "hrs" end if timemm > 0 then timeduration=timeduration .. clr2 .. timemm .. clr1 .. "mins" end timeduration=timeduration .. clr2 .. timess .. clr1 .. "secs"
questpoints=questpoints .. "+" .. "%2" .. "mccp" questpointthis=questpointthis + tonumber("%2") questpointtotal=questpointtotal + tonumber("%2")
if statusdetail > 0 then SendNoEcho(sendresults .. " " .. clr1 .. "Quest completed" .. clr3 .. ":" .. timeduration .. " " .. questpoints .. "=" .. clr2 .. questpointthis .. clr1 .. "qps" .. questextras .. clr3 .. " " .. questgold .. clr1 .. "gold.") else SendNoEcho("Echo " .. clr1 .. "Quest completed" .. clr3 .. ":" .. timeduration .. " " .. questpoints .. "=" .. clr2 .. questpointthis .. clr1 .. "qps" .. questextras .. clr3 .. " " .. questgold .. clr1 .. "gold.") end
statusquest=0 InfoBackground ("#F5F5DC") SetStatus(" ")
Execute("#senddisplay") EnableGroup ("questgroup", false)

trigger.match: *Congratulations hero. You have increased your powers!
trigger.send: EnableGroup ("puppingresults", true) tempstorage=clr1 .. "PuP"

puptotal=puptotal+1 puptrains=puptrains + tonumber(%2)
tempstorage=tempstorage .. clr1 .. "(" .. puptotal .. ") " tempstorage=tempstorage .. clr2 .. tonumber(%2) .. clr3 .. ":" .. clr1 .. "(" .. puptrains .. ")trains"
EnableGroup ("puppingresults", false)
if statusdetail > 0 then if statusgroup > 0 then SendNoEcho("gt " .. tempstorage) else SendNoEcho("echo " .. tempstorage) end end
Execute("#senddisplay")

trigger.match: QUEST: You may now quest again.
trigger.send:
statusquest=1
if statusdetail > 0 then if statusgroup > 0 then SendNoEcho("gt " .. clr3 .. "::::" .. clr1 .. " Quest Alert " .. clr3 .. "::::") else SendNoEcho("echo " .. clr3 .. "::::" .. clr1 .. " Quest Alert " .. clr3 .. "::::") end end
InfoBackground ("#FF8F8F") SetStatus("::: You May Now Quest ::: You May Now Quest ::: You May Now Quest :::")
questfrom = "%2" EnableGroup ("questgroup", true)
questmob="%2"

trigger.match: *tells you 'of * which is in the general area*
trigger.send: questroom="%2"
questarea="%2"

trigger.match: *tells you 'You have * minutes to complete your quest.'
trigger.send:
questtime="%2" questtime1=os.time () questextras=""
SetStatus(questfrom .. " " .. questtime .. "min Quest: " .. questmob .. ", " .. questroom .. ", " .. questarea .. ".")
if statusdetail > 0 then SendNoEcho(sendresults .. " " .. clr1 .. questfrom .. " " .. clr2 .. questtime .. clr1 .. "min Quest #" .. questcounttotal+1 .. clr3 .. ": " .. clr1 .. questmob .. ", " .. questroom .. ", " .. questarea .. ".") else SendNoEcho("Echo " .. clr1 .. questfrom .. " " .. clr2 .. questtime .. clr1 .. "min Quest #" .. questcounttotal+1 .. clr3 .. ": " .. clr1 .. questmob .. ", " .. questroom .. ", " .. questarea .. ".") end

trigger.match: *QUEST: You have almost completed your QUEST*
trigger.send: InfoBackground ("#98fb98") SetStatus("::: Quest completed, return to questor ::: Quest completed, return to questor :::")

trigger.match: Welcome to Aardwolf. May your adventures be mystical, challenging and rewarding.
trigger.send: Execute("#startup")

timetemp=math.abs(os.difftime (timestart, os.time ())) timehh=(math.floor(math.abs(timetemp/3600))) timemm=(math.floor(math.abs(timetemp/60))-(timehh*60)) timess=timetemp-(timehh*3600) timess=timess-(timemm*60) timeduration="" if timehh > 0 then timeduration=clr2 .. timehh .. clr1 .. "hrs" end if timemm > 0 then timeduration=timeduration .. clr2 .. timemm .. clr1 .. "mins" end timeduration=timeduration .. clr2 .. timess .. clr1 .. "secs"
skillinc=skillinc + 1
if statusdetail > 0 then if statusgroup > 0 then SendNoEcho("gt " .. clr1 .. "After " .. clr2 .. timeduration .. " my " .. clr3 .. "%2" .. clr1 .. " improved(".. skillinc .. ").") end Execute("#senddisplay") end

trigger.match: *tells you 'As a reward, I am giving you * quest points and * gold.'
trigger.send:
questfrom="%1"
questpoints="%2" questpointthis=tonumber("%2") questpointtotal=questpointtotal + tonumber("%2")
questgold="%3"
questcounttotal=questcounttotal + 1

trigger.match: *tells you 'I am also giving you * quest* point* tier*
trigger.send: questpoints=questpoints .. "+" .. "%2" .. "tier" questpointthis=questpointthis + tonumber("%2") questpointtotal=questpointtotal + tonumber("%2") questtier=questtier + tonumber("%2")

trigger.match: You get * gold coins from * corpse*
trigger.send:
testvariable = (string.gsub("%1", ",", ""))
if tonumber(testvariable) then mobgoldtotal=mobgoldtotal + tonumber(testvariable) mobgold=tonumber(testvariable) mobgoldhour=mobgoldhour + mobgold mobgolddouble=mobgolddouble + mobgold end
mobkilltotal=mobkilltotal + 1 mobkillhour=mobkillhour + 1 mobkilldouble=mobkilldouble + 1
if pkcheck > 0 then ColourNote("black","#F5F5DC"," " .. "Room Exit Checking is Active ") SendNoEcho("Exit") end
Execute("#senddisplay")

trigger.match: *You get lucky and gain an extra * quest points*
trigger.send: questpoints=questpoints .. "+" .. "%2" .. "luck" questpointthis=questpointthis + tonumber("%2") questpointtotal=questpointtotal + tonumber("%2") questluck=questluck + tonumber("%2")

testvariable = (string.gsub("%1", ",", ""))
if tonumber(testvariable) then mobgoldtotal=mobgoldtotal + tonumber(testvariable) mobgold=tonumber(testvariable) mobgoldhour=mobgoldhour + mobgold mobgolddouble=mobgolddouble + mobgold end
Execute("#senddisplay")
questextras=questextras .. " +practice" questpractices=questpractices + 1

trigger.match: You are charged * gold clan skill tax.
trigger.send:
testvariable = (string.gsub("%1", ",", ""))
if tonumber(testvariable) then mobgold=tonumber(testvariable) mobgoldtotal=mobgoldtotal - mobgold mobgoldhour=mobgoldhour - mobgold mobgolddouble=mobgolddouble - mobgold clantaxtotal=clantaxtotal + mobgold end
Execute("#senddisplay")
questextras=questextras .. " +" .. "%2" .. "practices" questpractices=questpractices + tonumber("%2")

trigger.match: You killed a Triv bonus mob!! Triv point added.
trigger.send:
timetemp=math.abs(os.difftime (timestart, os.time ())) timehh=(math.floor(math.abs(timetemp/3600))) timemm=(math.floor(math.abs(timetemp/60))-(timehh*60)) timess=timetemp-(timehh*3600) timess=timess-(timemm*60) timeduration="" if timehh > 0 then timeduration=clr2 .. timehh .. clr1 .. "hrs" end if timemm > 0 then timeduration=timeduration .. clr2 .. timemm .. clr1 .. "mins" end timeduration=timeduration .. clr2 .. timess .. clr1 .. "secs"
trivmob=trivmob + 1
if statusdetail > 0 then Send(sendresults .. " " .. clr1 .. "After " .. clr2 .. timeduration .. " and " .. clr2 .. (mobkilltotal + 1) .. clr1 .. "kills I've uncovered a " .. clr3 .. "Trivia Mob " .. clr1 .. "making this #" .. clr2 .. trivmob .. clr1 .. ".") end
Execute("#senddisplay")
questextras=questextras .. " +train" questtrains=questtrains + 1
questextras=questextras .. " +TRIVIA" questtrivias=questtrivias + 1

trigger.match: *You hang your head in shame and admit defeat*
trigger.send: statusquest=0 SendNoEcho(sendresults .. " :tells " .. questfrom .. " exactly what he/she thinks of that quest and tells " .. questfrom .. " to file it!!!!!") InfoBackground ("#F5F5DC") SetStatus(" ") EnableGroup ("questgroup", false)

alias.send:
timetemp=math.abs(os.difftime (timestart, os.time ())) timehh=(math.floor(math.abs(timetemp/3600))) timemm=(math.floor(math.abs(timetemp/60))-(timehh*60)) timess=timetemp-(timehh*3600) timess=timess-(timemm*60)
tempstorage=""
if mobkilltotal > 0 then tempstorage="[Kills" .. ":" .. mobkilltotal if vorpaltotal > 0 then tempstorage=tempstorage .. " " .. vorpaltotal .. "Vp" end if deathblowtotal > 0 then tempstorage=tempstorage .. " " .. deathblowtotal .. "Db" end if assassintotal > 0 then tempstorage=tempstorage .. " " .. assassintotal .. "As" end if trivmob > 0 then tempstorage=tempstorage .. " " .. trivmob .. "triv" end tempstorage=tempstorage .. "]" end
if puptotal > 0 then tempstorage=tempstorage .. "[Pups" .. ":" .. puptotal tempstorage=tempstorage .. "]" end
if leveltotal > 0 then tempstorage=tempstorage .. "[Lvls" .. ":" .. leveltotal tempstorage=tempstorage .. "]" end
if mobexptotal > 0 then tempstorage=tempstorage .. "[Exp" .. ":" .. mobexptotal .. " " .. math.ceil(mobexptotal/((timehh*60)+timemm)) .. "min" tempstorage=tempstorage .. "]" end
if mobgoldtotal > 0 then tempstorage=tempstorage .. "[Gold" .. ":" .. mobgoldtotal .. " " .. math.ceil(mobgoldtotal/((timehh*60)+timemm)) .. "min" if clantaxtotal > 0 then tempstorage=tempstorage .. " " .. clantaxtotal .. "ctax" end tempstorage=tempstorage .. "]" end
if questcounttotal > 0 then tempstorage=tempstorage .. "[Quests" .. ":" .. questcounttotal .. " " tempstorage=tempstorage .. questpointtotal .. "qps"
if questluck > 0 then tempstorage=tempstorage .. " " .. questluck .. "lk" end
if questtier > 0 then tempstorage=tempstorage .. questtier .. "ti" end
if questtrains > 0 then tempstorage=tempstorage .. " " .. questtrains .. "tr" end
if questpractices > 0 then tempstorage=tempstorage .. questpractices .. "pr" end
if questtrivias > 0 then tempstorage=tempstorage .. questtrivias .. "tp" end
tempstorage=tempstorage .. "]" end
if skillinc > 0 then tempstorage=tempstorage .. "[Skills: " .. skillinc .. "inc" if skillmas > 0 then tempstorage=tempstorage .. " " .. skillmas .. "mas" end tempstorage=tempstorage .. "]" end
if skintotal > 0 then tempstorage=tempstorage .. "[Skins" .. ":" .. skintotal tempstorage=tempstorage .. "]" end
if trophytotal > 0 then tempstorage=tempstorage .. "[Trophs" .. ":" .. trophytotal tempstorage=tempstorage .. "]" end
if ((timehh*60)+timemm) > 0 then InfoClear() Info("STv" .. stversion .. ":" .. ((timehh*60)+timemm) .. "mins " .. tempstorage) else InfoClear() InfoFont ("Arial", 9, 0) Info("Tracking will be displayed after the 1st minute has elapsed.") end

timetemp=math.abs(os.difftime (timestart, os.time ())) timehh=(math.floor(math.abs(timetemp/3600))) timemm=(math.floor(math.abs(timetemp/60))-(timehh*60)) timess=timetemp-(timehh*3600) timess=timess-(timemm*60) timeduration="" if timehh > 0 then timeduration=clr2 .. timehh .. clr1 .. "hrs" end if timemm > 0 then timeduration=timeduration .. clr2 .. timemm .. clr1 .. "mins" end timeduration=timeduration .. clr2 .. timess .. clr1 .. "secs"
tempstorage=""
if mobkilltotal > 0 then tempstorage="[" tempstorage=tempstorage .. "Kills" .. clr3 .. ":" .. clr2 .. mobkilltotal .. clr1 if vorpaltotal > 0 then tempstorage=tempstorage .. " " .. "Vorp" .. clr3 .. ":" .. clr2 .. vorpaltotal .. clr1 end if deathblowtotal > 0 then tempstorage=tempstorage .. " " .. "DBlow" .. clr3 .. ":" .. clr2 .. deathblowtotal .. clr1 end if assassintotal > 0 then tempstorage=tempstorage .. " " .. "Assass" .. clr3 .. ":" .. clr2 .. assassintotal .. clr1 end if trivmob > 0 then tempstorage=tempstorage .. " " .. "Triv" .. clr3 .. ":" .. clr2 .. trivmob .. clr1 end tempstorage=tempstorage .. "]" end
if leveltotal > 0 then tempstorage=tempstorage .. " " .. "[Levels" .. clr3 .. ":" .. clr2 .. leveltotal .. clr1 if levelhps > 0 then tempstorage=tempstorage .. " " .. clr3 .. levelhps .. clr1 .. "hps" end if levelmana > 0 then tempstorage=tempstorage .. clr3 .. levelmana .. clr1 .. "man" end if levelmoves > 0 then tempstorage=tempstorage .. clr3 .. levelmoves .. clr1 .. "mov" end if levelpractices > 0 then tempstorage=tempstorage .. " " .. clr3 .. levelpractices .. clr1 .. "pracs" end if leveltrains > 0 then tempstorage=tempstorage .. clr3 .. leveltrains .. clr1 .. "train" end tempstorage=tempstorage .. "]" end
if puptotal > 0 then tempstorage=tempstorage .. " " .. "[Pups" .. clr3 .. ":" .. clr2 .. puptotal .. clr1 if puptrains > 0 then tempstorage=tempstorage .. " " .. clr3 .. puptrains .. clr1 .. "train" end tempstorage=tempstorage .. "]" end
if mobexptotal > 0 then tempstorage=tempstorage .. " " .. "[" tempstorage=tempstorage .. "Exp" .. clr3 .. ":" .. clr2 .. mobexptotal .. clr1 .. " " if timemm > 0 then tempstorage=tempstorage .. clr3 .. math.ceil(mobexptotal/mobkilltotal) .. clr1 .. "kill" tempstorage=tempstorage .. " " .. clr3 .. math.ceil(mobexptotal/((timehh*60)+timemm)) .. clr1 .. "min" end tempstorage=tempstorage .. "]" end
if mobkilltotal > 0 then tempstorage=tempstorage .. " " .. "[" if mobgoldtotal > 0 then tempstorage=tempstorage .. "Gold" .. clr3 .. ":" .. clr2 .. mobgoldtotal .. clr1 if mobkilltotal > 0 then tempstorage=tempstorage .. " " .. clr3 .. math.ceil(mobgoldtotal/mobkilltotal) .. clr1 .. "kill" end if timemm > 0 then tempstorage=tempstorage .. " " .. clr3 .. math.ceil(mobgoldtotal/((timehh*60)+timemm)) .. clr1 .. "min" end end if mobgoldtotal > 0 then if clantaxtotal > 0 then tempstorage=tempstorage .. " " .. clr3 .. clantaxtotal .. clr1 .. "clantax" end end tempstorage=tempstorage .. "]" end
if questcounttotal > 0 then tempstorage=tempstorage .. clr1 .. " " .. "[Quests" .. clr3 .. ":" .. clr2 .. questcounttotal .. " " tempstorage=tempstorage .. clr3 .. questpointtotal .. clr1 .. "qps" if questluck > 0 then tempstorage=tempstorage .. clr3 .. questluck .. clr1 .. "luck" end if questtier > 0 then tempstorage=tempstorage .. clr3 .. questtier .. clr1 .. "tierqps" end
if questpractices > 0 then tempstorage=tempstorage .. clr3 .. " " .. questpractices .. clr1 .. "pracs" end if questtrains > 0 then tempstorage=tempstorage .. clr3 .. questtrains .. clr1 .. "train" end if questtrivias > 0 then tempstorage=tempstorage .. clr3 .. questtrivias .. clr1 .. "tps" end tempstorage=tempstorage .. "]" end
if skillinc > 0 then tempstorage=tempstorage .. " " .. "[" tempstorage=tempstorage .. "Skills" .. clr3 .. ":" .. clr2 .. skillinc .. clr1 .. "inc" if skillmas > 0 then tempstorage=tempstorage .. " " .. clr3 .. skillmas .. clr1 .. "mas" end tempstorage=tempstorage .. "]" end
if skintotal > 0 then tempstorage=tempstorage .. " " .. "[Skins" .. clr3 .. ":" .. clr2 .. skintotal .. clr1 tempstorage=tempstorage .. "]" end
if trophytotal > 0 then tempstorage=tempstorage .. " " .. "[Troph" .. clr3 .. ":" .. clr2 .. trophytotal .. clr1 tempstorage=tempstorage .. "]" end
if ((timehh*60)+timemm) > 0 then SendNoEcho(sendresults .. " :reports after" .. clr3 .. " " .. clr1 .. timeduration .. clr1 .. " " .. tempstorage) Execute("#senddisplay") else InfoClear() InfoFont ("Arial", 9, 0) Info("Report will be sent after the 1st minute has elapsed.") end
sendresults="%1" ColourNote("black","#F5F5DC"," " .. "Sharptracker Output Sent To [ " .. sendresults .. " ] ")

stversion="205g"
ShowInfoBar(true) SetStatus(" ") ResetStatusTime() ResetTimers() InfoClear()
timestart=os.time () questtime=os.time ()
mobkill=0 mobkilldouble=0 mobkillhour=0 mobkilltotal=0
mobgold=0 mobgolddouble=0 mobgoldhour=0 mobgoldtotal=0
mobexp=0 mobexpdouble=0 mobexphour=0 mobexptotal=0
EnableGroup ("questgroup", false) questfrom="unassigned" questmob="unassigned" questroom="unassigned" questarea="unassigned"
questcounttotal=0 questpointtotal=0 questluck=0 questtier=0 questpractices=0 questtrains=0 questtrivias=0
EnableGroup ("levellingresults", false) leveltotal=0 levelhps=0 levelmana=0 levelmoves=0 levelpractices=0 leveltrains=0
EnableGroup ("puppingresults", false) puptotal=0 puptrains=0
sendresults="gt" EnableGroup ("attrib", false) statusdouble=0 statusdetail=1 statusgroup=1 statusquest=0 clantaxtotal=0 pkcheck=0 vorpaltotal=0 deathblowtotal=0 assassintotal=0 trivmob=0 skillinc=0 skillmas=0 skintotal=0 trophytotal=0
--[[ SharptrackerColours --]] clr1="@w" clr2="@Y" clr3="@y"
Execute("#sendhelp")
InfoBackground ("#F5F5DC") InfoClear() InfoFont ("Arial", 10, 3) Info("Sharp Tracker " .. stversion .. ": Variables and Timers Reset. - E N J O Y")
if pkcheck > 0 then pkcheck = 0 ColourNote("black","#F5F5DC"," " .. "PK Room Checking Disabled ") else pkcheck = 1 ColourNote("black","#F5F5DC"," " .. "PK Room Checking Enabled ") end

if statusdetail > 0 then statusdetail = 0 ColourNote("black","#F5F5DC"," " .. "Channel Reporting Disabled ") else statusdetail = 1 ColourNote("black","#F5F5DC"," " .. "Channel Reporting Enabled ") end
if statusgroup > 0 then statusgroup = 0 ColourNote("black","#F5F5DC"," " .. "Group Reporting Disabled ") else statusgroup = 1 ColourNote("black","#F5F5DC"," " .. "Group Reporting Enabled ") end

ColourNote("black","#F5F5DC"," " .. "---------------------------------------------------------------------------- ") ColourNote("black","#F5F5DC"," " .. "Sharp Tracker by Huitzil Opochtli. | Aardwolf V3 - April 2008 ") ColourNote("black","#F5F5DC"," " .. "Mushclient V4.19 Now Totally Freeware. | http://www.gammon.com.au ") ColourNote("black","#F5F5DC"," " .. "---------------------------------------------------------------------------- ") ColourNote("black","#F5F5DC"," " .. " #startup - initalize Sharp Tracker. ") ColourNote("black","#F5F5DC"," " .. " #sendhelp - display Sharp Tracker commands. ") ColourNote("black","#F5F5DC"," " .. " #sendto x - pick channel to report results eg #sendto gt (default). ") ColourNote("black","#F5F5DC"," " .. " #sendattrib - display character attributes to channel. ") ColourNote("black","#F5F5DC"," " .. " #sendtotal - display Sharp Tracker Totals to channel. ") ColourNote("black","#F5F5DC"," " .. " #sendroomcheck - toggle Exit command on every MOB kill(detect PK rooms). ") ColourNote("black","#F5F5DC"," " .. " #sendgroupcheck - toggle Report/Suppress Sharp Tracker Group reporting. ") ColourNote("black","#F5F5DC"," " .. " #senddetailcheck - toggle Report/Suppress All Sharp Tracker reporting. ") ColourNote("black","#F5F5DC"," " .. "---------------------------------------------------------------------------- ")

timer.send:
tempstorage="It's been a peaceful last hour, nothing to report!" if mobkilltotal > 0 then if mobkillhour > 0 then tempstorage=clr1 .. "LastHour"
tempstorage=tempstorage .. " " .. clr3 .. "[" .. clr2 .. mobkillhour .. clr3 .. ":" .. clr1 .. "kills" tempstorage=tempstorage .. " " .. clr3 .. math.ceil(mobkillhour/60) .. clr1 .. "kills/min" tempstorage=tempstorage .. clr3 .. "]"
tempstorage=tempstorage .. " " .. "[" .. clr2 .. mobexphour .. clr3 .. ":" .. clr1 .. "exps" tempstorage=tempstorage .. " " .. clr3 .. math.ceil(mobexphour/60) .. clr1 .. "exp/min" tempstorage=tempstorage .. " " .. clr3 .. math.ceil(mobexphour/mobkillhour) .. clr1 .. "exp/kill" tempstorage=tempstorage .. clr3 .. "]"
tempstorage=tempstorage .. " " .. "[" .. clr2 .. mobgoldhour .. clr3 .. ":" .. clr1 .. "gold" tempstorage=tempstorage .. " " .. clr3 .. math.ceil(mobgoldhour/60) .. clr1 .. "gold/min" tempstorage=tempstorage .. " " .. clr3 .. math.ceil(mobgoldhour/mobkillhour) .. clr1 .. "gold/kill" tempstorage=tempstorage .. clr3 .. "]" end
if statusdetail > 0 then if statusgroup > 0 then SendNoEcho("gt " .. tempstorage) Execute("#senddisplay") end end
mobkillhour=0 mobexphour=0 mobgoldhour=0 end
